full_text.0: @tdubinyoface @usmntonly Brotha Pulisic is starting on the left flank regardless of whatever is going on with our formation and the rest of the team
full_text.2: @PrincipalRoskos This World Cup is different. For one, it is being held in November and December instead of summer. This WC also has two local players, one from Medford, NJ (Brenden Aaronson who also played for the Union) and Christian Pulisic from Hershey, PA.

full_text.20:
For the first time ever, USMNT fans are hoping Pulisic doesn't start or even come off the bench for Chelsea today.

Also, Marsch should do his fellow countrymen a favor and just have Adams and Aaronson pack their bags instead of dress for the match. #USMNT
full_text.21: “There’s the Leadership Council, a group of six players elected by their peers who consult with Berhalter on issues big and small. Long, McKennie, Pulisic, Steffen, Tyler Adams and Tim Ream.” - SI 2021. Makes sense why Long is in no matter how bad he plays…
